title: Stanley takes a trip
creator_credit: Helen Mackay, Grant Munro, Jim MacKay and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: The importance of a balanced diet, told in story form for children through the medium of two-dimensional cut-out animation. Stanley is a little boy who is lethargic from lack of a balanced diet. Some animals take him for a trip on the back of a “train engine” bull, to discover what are the proper foods for health and where they come from.
creator_credit_for_label: Helen Mackay, Grant Munro, Jim MacKay and National Film Board of Canada
